column4: Can someone tell me how to fix a kernel panic on boot? "<0>Kernel panic - not syncing: Attempted to kill init!" I had to force a shutdown and this was the result. Do i have to reinstall?
no, but that means you have found a bug in the kernel.
can you reccomend a course of action?
bugs.kernel.org and there is a nice HOWTO on how to report kernel bugs.
